# Basic Syntax

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(hflights)
head(hflights)
hflights.agg <- hflights %>% group_by(Month,DayofMonth) %>% summarize(mean.time=mean(DepDelay,na.rm=TRUE))
ggplot(hflights.agg,aes(Month,DayofMonth,fill=mean.time))+geom_tile()
```
